Title: Be aware of undone tasksbefore the next sprint
As a user, I want to be able to see a summary of my vehicle activities on the main screen
As a user, I want to easily input and update my vehicle's mileage to maintain an accurate record during use.
As a user, I want access to settings to customize my vehicle profile and maintenance tracking.
As a user, I want the ability to configure maintenance reminders based on the manufacturer's recommendations or my custom schedule.
Create an input field for users to enter their vehicle's mileage.
Ensure that the summary data is updated in real-time as users log maintenance activities and mileage.
Allow users to customize maintenance reminder schedules to match their preferences.
Develop the functionality to update and store mileage information in the user's profile.
Send notifications to users when maintenance is due based on the configured reminders.
